GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix NULL pointer dereference in nilfs_palloc_commit_free_entry()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.268 by commit bc3fd3293887b4cf84a9109700faeb82de533c89. For more details please see the references link.
